channel.title: Ubuntu 9.04 metacity --replace
channel.description: I have been running ubuntu 9.04 on my laptop for some time now and everything has been fine. With the exception of not finding drivers for my bluetooth device. Recently however everytime I start the computer the top of the windows are missing. I've looked at the ubuntu help forums and they say to run metacity --replace in terminal and this does fix my problem. However I have to do this everytime i start the computer. Does anyone know where I can troubleshoot this matter?

item.title: Ubuntu 9.04 metacity --replace
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Thank you for the fix it did solve the problem but i still want to look for a better solution.

Read full topic
